text:
"Nahh nanti lo jangan kemana-mana dulu, kami bertiga mau kenal sama lo lebih-"
"Tunggu, bertiga?" Ucapan Wooyoung terpotong. Mingi bingung, kok bertiga, kan cuma dia sama Honjoong yang ia tau. Atau mungkin masih ada kru lain?
Bersamaan dengan itu, Yeosang masuk dari pintu depan kelas sambil membawa tumpukan buku dan meletakkannya di meja guru. Wooyoung yang menyadari itu langsung memanggil laki-laki tersebut.
"Ketua kelas!" Sambil melambaikan tangan untuk menyuruh Yeosang mendekat padanya.
Melihat hal itu, Yeosang langsung mendekat ke arah mereka. Sesampainya di sana Yeosang langsung bertanya kepada Wooyoung 'ada apa' sambil sedikit melirik ke arah Mingi, Wooyoung langsung menghadap kembali kebelakang.
"Nah, gi, ini Yeosang. Dia juga bagian dari Hurricane."
Mingi sedikit terbelalak melihat ke arah Yeosang.
Yeosang yg ditatap seperti itu langsung menggelengkan tangannya di depan dada.
trans:
"Ah, don't go anywhere, three of us wanna know you more-"
"Wait, three of you?" Wooyoung words are cut off. Mingi is confused, why three, all she knows is just him and Honjoong, or maybe there is another crew?
At the same time, Yeosang enters the front door of the class bringing a pile of books and putting them on the teacher's desk. Wooyoung who realizes about it calls that boy immediately.
"The class president!" waving his hand asking Yeosang to get closer to him.
Seeing it, Yeosang gets closer to them immediately. After he is with them, Yeosang asks Wooyoung "What's wrong?" as he glances at Mingi, Wooyoung turns back her body.
"Well, Gi, this is Yeosang. He is also part of Hurricane."
Mingi's eyes widened slightly as he looked at Yeosang.
Yeosang who is stared like that crosses his arms over his chest.
